title: File State Annual Report
description: An LLC needs to file its required annual report with the state's Secretary of State to remain in good standing.

tasks.description: Look up the due date and filing fee for the annual report in the specific state.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the correct deadline and fee.

tasks.description: Update any required information, such as the company's registered agent or principal address.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent ensures all company information is current.

tasks.description: Prepare and file the annual report with the state and pay the fee.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully completes the compliance filing.
